verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] commuting the life sentence of Alice Marie Johnson , a woman convicted of drug offenses whose cause was championed by reality TV star Kim Kardashian West .

President Donald Trump is commuting the life sentence of Alice Marie Johnson , a woman convicted of drug offenses whose cause [V: was] championed by reality TV star Kim Kardashian West .
